==================

### Government Tender Announcement: Ground Test Demonstrator

#### Title: 9F055-230081

#### Solicitation Number: WS4269620441
#### Publication Date: 2023-10-23
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-12T14:00:00
#### Amendment Number: 4
#### Amendment Date: 2023-12-08

#### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Ground Test Demonstrator project. The procurement category is SRV, and the UNSPSC code is 81141901, which corresponds to Product research and development service.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria are based on the highest technical merit within a stipulated maximum budget.

#### Tender Process
The tender process is conducted through SAP Ariba (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17798046), where the detailed bid solicitation documents are available.

#### Contract Details
* Expected contract start date: 2024-01-10
* Expected contract end date: 2025-01-08
* Regions of delivery: Quebec (except NCR)
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Branch: Level 2

#### Points of Contact
For any inquiries related to this tender, please contact Erin Flanagan, SPAC/PSPC, at erin.flanagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Attachment
No attachments are available for this tender.
